website_summaries.verdict: Unbeatable for making large ice cubes that will keep drinks cool for hours.
pros: Makes 2.25" ice cubes that keeps drinks cold for longer
cons: Some have trouble removing the cubes until they master the technique

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not great. Flimsy plastic doesn't maintain shape.
customer_reviews.text: These trays create very large cubes which is their positive draw. But this is only an average product. The plastic is very thin and flimsy which leads to two issues. The cubes don't come out as cubes but irregular blobs that in my experience get more weirdly shaped as the plastic loosens. And the flimsy plastic means you need to be careful carrying them when they're full of water. I have a few different molds that create 2" cubes which are sturdy and great. I don't think the problems with these is worth it to get just slightly larger cubes. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Slash

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose uses
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to put homemade bone broth in. They are a good size to add broth to dishes. Easy to freeze and easy to dispense only what you need. You can obviously use to make ice but think our of the box...homemade baby food, spices, use up your lemons to make frozen concentrate to use later. Love these cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Delara

customer_reviews.title: The tops don’t snap into place
customer_reviews.text: The tops slide off at the slightest jostling. I bought these with the thought of keeping other scents in the freezer from contaminating the ice but they do not achieve that goal.
customer_reviews.author: jason finn

customer_reviews.title: Beware these are large
customer_reviews.text: Got these so we can be cool and do the fancy whiskey thing. Liked the idea of cubes over the spheres and don’t want the stones as I like I a little ice melt to smooth out the taste. This set is really nice and affordable. Very easy to use. The only thing is the size is very large. Larger than most I saw which I thought that was a good thing. They actually are so big they don’t fit in the glasses we have unless I run them under water a few seconds to shrink them down just a tiny bit. I’m ok with it but just something to be mindful of.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bock

customer_reviews.title: Substantial not like some of the other flimsy ones
customer_reviews.text: Seems the bigger ice cubes you want, the flimsier the trays get. But these are pretty good. Recently bought a second set with lids. To remove the ice cube, microwave some water for a minute in a container large enough to accommodate this ice cube tray. Don't over fill it, measure the amount first. Once the water is heated, soak the tray for a couple minutes and then push the cubes up from the bottom. Voila!!!
customer_reviews.author: God Bless US

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful size cube
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful size ice cube maker. I like that the container doesn’t take up a lot of space in the freezer. It’s easy to remove the cube from the container. I do have an itsie bitsie issue with closing the lid. But I’ve figured it out. You just have to close it from top and bottom of the lid. Just pinch it with your index finger and middle finger while pressing down with your thumb. I also have not stacked these on top of each other in the freezer. Once I do I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: colleen c.

customer_reviews.title: The large ice cubes stay a long time
customer_reviews.text: So I have an ice therapy machine and if you put regular refrigerated or bag ice and it it doesn't last very long. So I bought these and started making my own ice. They're big and they last a long time. I haven't made ice to put in my coolers yet but I think these are going to be perfect for staying power when you put them in a cooler. very easy to use the silicone molds take them out of the freezer wait a couple minutes and the ice cube's will slide right out.
customer_reviews.author: Z-man

customer_reviews.title: Big Ice Cubes!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use. Just take them out of the freezer and let them sit for a couple of minutes. Then push up on the inside corner and it comes right out. Once you get one out the others also comes out. Easy to use and clean. I live in Arizona and just love these. The cubes last a long time. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Fitzjearl

customer_reviews.title: NO LIDS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why would you include lids in the picture, lids in the description and not include lids!!! I am returning these. Very dissatisfied. This is deceptive marketing. I specifically shopped for trays with lids so my ice would not get contaminated in my freezer. This company either needs to send lids or change its marketing!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E

customer_reviews.title: Huge blocks
customer_reviews.text: This ice cubes are huge, they dont come out clear, and you have to pour water in order to get them out from the silicone. Great for old fashioned or to cool down anything without water down fast. Make sure that your glasses have a big opening because this are big, a little trick will be to pour water to make them smaller in order to make it fit into a glass with smaller opening.
customer_reviews.author: luislahoz

customer_reviews.title: I WAS DISAPPOINTED :(
customer_reviews.text: The trays are soft and flexible. the lids don't fit tight and it's a pain trying to get them into the freezer without spilling the water all over. The inside partitions are also flimsy so the cubes don't always come out square, but with a wavy shape. I'll be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to remove ONCE YOU GT THE KNACK. They're plenty big cubes, so make sure you have a wide glass. Nice thing is that they really don't melt quickly. No need to add ice for second round refills.
customer_reviews.author: howboy

customer_reviews.title: They are larger. Large enough to get stuck in the glass
customer_reviews.text: Needs better quality control. One of the molds have a dark piece in it. It's not silicon and contacts the ice. The other mold is fine. Getting the ice out is difficult, but it seems to be getting easier as I work it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryo

customer_reviews.title: A real ice cube
customer_reviews.text: This mold makes great large cubes that last an entire double cocktail and then some. A little rough on the top, but it melts to a nice shape. Just be sure your glass is big enough for the cube
customer_reviews.author: J B Cooper

customer_reviews.title: plastic smell. very difficult to remove ice from it.
customer_reviews.text: heavy plastic smell. VERY difficult to extract ice cubes from the device. plastic rubber cap does not fully seal & is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: E. L.

customer_reviews.title: push from the bottom to get ice out
customer_reviews.text: Other review say how hard it is to get the cubes, out, but you just have to apply pressure from underneath. Get the lids, it'll allow you to stack things, and prevent bad smells from getting into the ice. Really large cubes, and I love them for cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Ludo

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Got it for shave ice machine but cubes are way too big. Put less water in works! Make great giant whiskey cubes though so it’s getting use.
customer_reviews.author: Theopolicity

customer_reviews.title: good size cube
customer_reviews.text: I had imagined these would be a bit larger but still a good size ice cube - use them to cool down the water for the dogs and other animals during the heat of the summer
customer_reviews.author: E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The huge ice cubes are really fun. My only criticism is that the lids don't fit tightly. But maybe they couldn't be designed to do that because the water in the tray expands as it freezes. But it's really no big deal, so I would have given 4 and a half stars if there was an option for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Can’t remove ice without tearing tray. The one time it worked was a struggle just to get a couple cubes. I’d go with a solid tray you can bang on something to remove ice.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Probably should order some more
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are awesome. Only problem was that my glasses were kind of a tight fit. I was able to put the cube in first and pour my favorite bourbon on top. By the time it was ready to drink the cube size was perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: JustJeffy

customer_reviews.title: Need help finding cocktail glasses wide enough to fit these extra-large cubes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave four stars only because these cubes are TOO BIG for all my glassware. I bought these for my husband for Father's Day, and he was thrilled. We saw the large cubes at a bar we went to and he commented on what a great idea these were. The only problem is I can't find glasses with a wide enough opening. Please tag glassware that goes with these when you order, otherwise, I may have to return them. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kay R.

customer_reviews.title: Loose libs
customer_reviews.text: The lids are little larger so there is not a snug secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once they are filled it is hard to get it in the freezer without spilling water because it is so soft and ply able. We have to put them on a tray and sit them in the freezer that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amye Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These trays make really nice size cubes for your drinks. They are big and don't dilute as fast which is key! I shut my ice maker off! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Green Tea

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just used first time. Like that it is sturdy enough to walk contents to freezer without spills. Lid really helps. I’m using to freeze lemon juice from my Meyer lemon tree. Perfect size for recipes requiring larger amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very “cool”
customer_reviews.text: The bigger cubes really do keep the beverage colder and less diluted for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and remove cube. Large cubes, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa♡

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to remove the chunk of ice from the tray. But the size of the ice cube is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L.

customer_reviews.title: To big For Glass
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is well made. It's also easy to fill and remove the cubes. However, BIG ISSUE is that the cubes do not fit in any of the highball glasses that I have. I had to break the cubes to fit- completely defeating the purpose of buying this product,
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nice big cubes
customer_reviews.text: Cool large ice cubes. Doesn’t fit in standard rocks glass but we have the glasses that goes with these cubes so they rock for us
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell and comestic mark
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product, it does smell strong of plastic chemical, and there was a brown scratch on one of mine. It's for large ice cubes and looks like the image color with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness of the ice cubes and ease of getting them out of the mold
customer_reviews.text: I have just about every ice mold that’s out there...round, square, medium size, large size, extra large size. I liked the idea that this one had lids. It keeps the ice cubes clean and these slip out of the mold so easy without having to run water over them to get them out. Don’t fill them all the way to the top though to allow for freezing. You won’t be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Makes giant
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Makes giant, clear ice cubes that are easy to take out. An absolute must for drinking any of the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Helmholtz_Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Makes amazing, huge ice cubes that keep your beverage cold and fresh tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love big ice cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I love a cocktail with one big ice cube. It melts slower, but keeps the drink cold!
customer_reviews.author: tungbo

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, works great!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, works great for making 2 1/4 inch ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Review

customer_reviews.title: Big Cubes
customer_reviews.text: The ice cube trays are as described, they are big cubes, and seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Only good enough
customer_reviews.text: The cubes are large but somewhat misshapen. It’s also difficult to get the cubes out of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeo Plaza

customer_reviews.title: Material is too soft
customer_reviews.text: The material the tray is made of is way too soft / thin / flimsy. If you are wanting perfect cubes this is not the tray for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Reordered when first set came without lids--and now the second set arrived without lids. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kucinski

customer_reviews.title: great ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Fun and different. Makes a good gift. I gave them to my son-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: maureen a buck

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect cubes for cocktails!
customer_reviews.text: I use these molds to make large ice cubes for cocktails. They perfectly fill a double old fashioned glass and are excellent for short drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Set them out few minutes. Ice pops out. Love that they come with lids to keep ice from tasting like a freezer
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that they have a cover
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they have a cover. I like that they're easy to eject from the mold, and that they don't seem to hold smells, at least so far. The large size is just what I wanted. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MaureenShea

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a proper ice cube for my bourbon!
customer_reviews.text: Now I have a proper ice cube for my bourbon!
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: I make strawberry ice cubes... with this size they melt much slower... love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cube, but not helpful for clear ice
customer_reviews.text: Does not help with making clear ice but makes a nice size
customer_reviews.author: GiL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great. Easy to keep in the freezer - you can stack things on top. Great quality. And , you get 2!!!👍
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with Lid
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but it did not come with the lids as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: What else do you want me to day, It's a ice cube tray. well made:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The ice trays appear to be well made
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The ice trays appear to be well made. The covers fit very good. The delivery was very reasonable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Sobalvarro

customer_reviews.title: Completely reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it without a doubt. I was trying different ice makers, none as good as this one!
customer_reviews.author: alvaro fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Love how easily the cubes come out and how slowly they melt.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Easy remove and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I ordered it with another brand one. This one is better to use it. Easy remove and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping drinks cold without watering them down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The trays are easy to use and make a perfect Whiskey ice cube.
customer_reviews.author: ecssa

customer_reviews.title: Great size cubes
customer_reviews.text: Great size cubes. Molds are of really low quality , not that think so all the ice that comes from them are warped . Don't expect perfect cubes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon K.

customer_reviews.title: Good large ice cubes for drinks.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cocktails when you want to minimize ice melt like us when we have a nightly gin and tonic. This is the second set I've purchased. One of the original trays developed a leak after almost daily use for a couple of years and the other tray had a small tear in the silicone divider between cubes. If you allow them to set for a couple of minutes after removal from the freezer it is easier to remove the cubes and less stressful to the silicone. I probably muscled my cubes out too many times damaging the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Kent and Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sippin Bourbon
customer_reviews.text: This new large cube is perfect for sippin' whiskey or bourbon. It just fits in the glass. Allows up to two shots. Keeps your drink chilled but not fast melting to weaken your great drink. I have also made a version about half full in the freezer container so it fit in a tall glass for iced tea. Again it doesn't melt as fast and the tea strength stays longer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great product for making cube molds!
customer_reviews.text: I made a special place in our freezer for these lovely Cube Molds. I am glad that I bought two pks., as it's easier to continue to make more ice cubes or use to freeze other food items. I know these cube molds will have a permanent place in our every day social and kitchen food preparations. It does take a bit longer for liquids to freeze because the cubes are larger, so take that into consideration when you are preparing your ice cubes. The lids are a plus for stability & easy stacking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diane

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are awful. The kids do not fit properly you have to plastic wrap the trays before putting the lid on if you want to keep you stuff fresh. This is such a poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I had been making my own big ice cubes for years, using muffin pans, or anything else that would work. I saw these, and was so happy to order them. The cubes are a lot easier to get out. I bought 2 sets, so can make 8 at a time. Then I take them out of the trays, stick in a baggie, and when I need them, there they are! I also use these trays to freeze tea, coffee, lemonade etc, so my other drinks don't become diluted. So happy to have found these trays!! Good product!
customer_reviews.author: peggy eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Useless Due to Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to freeze broth cubes, but they’re nearly useless. The compartments aren’t separated from one another, so you essentially end up with one big cube; each individual ice cube is impossible to remove without melting most of the ice. I think I can salvage this by filling only two compartments at a time, but I definitely wouldn’t advise that anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: lechun1

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!! Keep looking!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lid is ill fitting. The cube itself is a nightmare to remove and my tray has a hole in it after one use. Water leaked into the freezer. I wish i hadnt purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: April Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very thin walled
customer_reviews.text: This item was not what I was hoping it would be. I ended up throwing them away and getting something better.
customer_reviews.author: DVP

customer_reviews.title: One Option for Large Ice Cubes
customer_reviews.text: The finished, frozen cubes are great. The lids for the trays seem to have no practical value as they don’t snap firmly into place when re-filling the the trays to make new cubes. They are made of a very flexible, latex or rubber-like material so when full of fresh water, moving from the sink to the freezer is tricky. Tip: use less water, don’t fill to the top...downside on that = smaller cubes = bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Naleid

customer_reviews.title: Huge cubes!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the Houdini trays these don't keep their shape upon filling. The materials are softer and the lids only sit on top of the trays, they don't snap on. Overall I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Truth Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: great for freezing small portions of sauce
customer_reviews.text: We use these for freezing small portions of chili. They are just the right amount for chili dogs. My only "complaint" is that the lids are loose fitting (being that the product is silicone I guess this is to be expected).
customer_reviews.author: L. Loescher

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of these ice cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make frozen treats for my dogs and my chickens. The only thing I wish was that lids fit better---they just sit on top.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great for portion control
customer_reviews.text: Useing for large icecubes in summer. Use for soup and portion control. Want to get Souper Cubes next. Keep it on a hard flat surface to fill and freeze. Once frozen, the floppy silicon isn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carla F Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this but have to agree with other reviewers that it's difficult to get cubes out. Material is too thin & floppy and you have to carry & place carefully after filling. Also top does not fit securely. Would have purchsed for gifts if I loved it but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ktelshopper

customer_reviews.title: big ice
customer_reviews.text: I guess I did not realize that these cubes would be so big. The ice comes out easily but you really need a large pitcher to put it in as it gets stuck in a regular glass
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Works well for water jugs.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for water jugs. I use them in my 64 Oz that I take to the pickleball court. Keeps the water cooler longer. Our ice maker can not keep up with the ice needs in the summer here in FL. These help us from having empty ice makers all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY, HARD TO SEAL
customer_reviews.text: The structure is too flimsy which makes it difficult to get the cover and have a good seal. They're now wasting space in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: CanonUserVTTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: but they make nice big cubes
customer_reviews.text: these are made of some sort of silicone rubber, they are not solid plastic. bit of a trick to get them into the freezer without spilling a little. but they make nice big cubes.
customer_reviews.author: tinear55

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my DIY project. So far, so good. The molds keep shape well, although it’s relatively easy to unmold the product. Quality seems to be great. Hope these molds will be durable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mohini

customer_reviews.title: Nice big size
customer_reviews.text: They are in the freeze with my first bone broth in them. I have always used regular ice cube trays. I am hoping that these make it a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Yeah... large ice cubes!
customer_reviews.text: Um... yeah... large AF ice cube trays. Good for my bourbon drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great for making a pitcher of iced tea
customer_reviews.text: Much better option than using a bunch of regular ice.
customer_reviews.author: Vonzipper

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, no funky taste to the ice cubes. Great deal on pak of two!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Big ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: The larger ice cubes are perfect for the 32 oz drinking cups as well as cooling down steeped tea for iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting lid helps when transporting to the freezer
customer_reviews.text: Nice big cubes. Lid is a smart idea for long term storage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wahrhaftig

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: As promised on delivery. I have not used it yet, but it looks good and the tops fit.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn Gentry-taylor

customer_reviews.title: Practicle & Useful for iced tea
customer_reviews.text: Size of tray is nice and has a lid for stacking
customer_reviews.author: AK Woman

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I put fruit & herb leaves in them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I put fruit & herb leaves in them to make pretty & flavorful ice cubes. Easy to remove after freezing. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cubes for punch!
customer_reviews.text: Made ice cubes for a holiday punch with cranberries and rosemary. These trays were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I am definitely going to buy another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am definitely going to buy another two pack. I love to have these nice big cubes in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Noonz

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!!
customer_reviews.text: My ice cubes tasted like plastic. No more to be said.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Alba

product_meta.title: Praticube Large Ice Cube Mold - 4 Large 2.25 Inch Ice Cubes - Prevent Diluting Your Scotch, Whiskey, Cocktails - 2 Pack with Lids
feature_bullets: ✔ LARGE ICE CUBES KEEP DRINKS COOLER LONGER - Extra large ice cubes cool your drinks longer without over diluting them
✔ LARGEST ICE CUBE MOLD ON AMAZON - Most large ice trays on Amazon are 2 inches with Praticube you get 2.25-inch cubes which means even cooler drinks
✔ SAFE AND EASY TO USE - Made from durable BPA-free, food grade silicone so no need to worry about unwanted smells and harmful toxins. Dishwasher-safe
✔ GET CREATIVE - Not just for ice cubes, make frozen juice, coffee, or tea cubes - the only limit is your imagination - 2 trays for more fun
✔ INCLUDES LIDS - Lids help keep ice fresh and allows you to easily stack trays

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
